Date.description: The date of the recorded stock data

Symbol.description: The stock symbol, in this case, it is for Reliance Industries

value_dict.EQ: EQ represents the Equity segment of the stock

Prev Close.description: The closing price of the stock on the previous day, in INR

Open.description: The opening price of the stock on the given date, in INR

High.description: The highest price of the stock on the given date, in INR

Low.description: The lowest price of the stock on the given date, in INR

Last.description: The last traded price of the stock on the given date, in INR

Close.description: The closing price of the stock on the given date, in INR

VWAP.description: Volume Weighted Average Price of the stock on the given date, in INR

Volume.description: The number of shares traded on the given date

Turnover.description: The total turnover of the traded shares on the given date, in INR

Trades.description: The number of trades executed on the given date

Deliverable Volume.description: The number of shares which were actually delivered on the given date

%Deliverble.description: The percentage of the deliverable volume to the traded volume
